mapper.select: select row_number() over (order by onc_update desc) AS onc_num, onc_title, onc_m_email, onc_teacher, onc_code, onc_update, onc_cts_code from onlineclass
select row_number() over (order by ofc_update desc) AS ofc_num, ofc_title, ofc_m_email, ofc_teacher, ofc_code, ofc_update, ofc_cts_code from offclass
select row_number() over (order by y_update desc) AS y_num, y_title, y_profile, cts_name , y_update, y_code from AdYouClassDto
select * from cts where cts_code like 'c%'
select row_number() over (order by p_date desc) AS p_num, p_title, p_m_email, p_dealer , p_date, p_price, p_code, p_state from product where p_state = 1

select row_number() over (order by prv_date desc) AS prv_num, p.prv_date AS prv_date, p.prv_code AS prv_code, p.prv_content AS prv_content, p.prv_m_email AS prv_m_email, m.m_name AS m_name, w.w_state AS w_state from productreview p, member m,warning w where p.prv_m_email = m.m_email and p.prv_code = w.w_prv_code and w_state = '0'

select row_number() over (order by q_date desc) AS q_num, q.q_title AS title, q.q_content AS content, q.q_m_email AS email, q.q_date AS dates, q.q_code AS code, m.m_name AS name from question q, member m where q_m_email = m.m_email

select row_number() over (order by w_update desc, w_state) AS w_num, w.w_content AS contents, w.w_contentnum AS contentnum, w_state AS states, w.w_code AS code, w.w_update AS dates, m.m_name AS name, p.prv_content AS prv_content from warning w, member m,productreview p where w.w_m_email = m.m_email and p.prv_code = w.w_prv_code
select row_number() over (order by onc_update desc) AS onc_num, onc_title, onc_m_email, onc_teacher, onc_code, onc_update, onc_cts_code from onlineclass where onc_cts_code = #{cts}

select row_number() over (order by q_date desc) AS q_num, q.q_title AS title, q.q_content AS content, q.q_m_email AS email, q.q_date AS dates, q.q_code AS code, m.m_name AS name, q.q_anfield,q.q_andate from question q, member m where q_m_email = m.m_email and q_code = #{code}
